attributes.action: Reduce the amount MP's can claim on expenses in any calendar year
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With private companies reducing wage bills, laying workers off and bonuses being cut. Should not our elected MP's agree to reduce the amount they can claim on expenses in any calendar year. In order to show support for the people who elect them.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
